name: Neonbulus
description:
An arcade game made for Masters Degree project. The task was to develop any kind of game with the assets provided with no possible modification of any of them.

You have to reach the goal, keep moving avoiding obstacles and hit enemies with your powerful sword! If you miss and hit anything you may wake up in the middle of the night O.O

Controls:

Controller:

  • Movement - Left Joystick
  • Rotation - Right Joystick
  • Start button for play
  • "0" or "B" for exit game and menu.

Keyboard:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Rotation - Arrow Keys
  • Space for play
  • Escape for exit game and menu

I decided to make an accesible game (only 2 buttons are needed to play) that uses camera shakes, game controller vibration, dinamic UI HUD and persistence for highscoring.
